Package org.cpsolver.exam.criteria.additional

Examination Timetabling: Additional (Experimental) Criteria.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DistanceToStronglyPreferredRoom
    Experimental criterion measuring average distance (in meters) to the strongly preferred room (or rooms) of the examination.
    DistributionViolation
    Experimental criterion counting violations of hard distribution constraints.
    PeriodViolation
    Experimental criterion counting violations of periods assignments.
    RoomViolation
    Experimental criterion counting violations of room assignments.
    StudentMoreThan1ADayConflicts
    Number of more than One exam a day student conflicts.

Package org.cpsolver.exam.criteria.additional Description

Examination Timetabling: Additional (Experimental) Criteria.

This packages contains additional (experimental) criteria that may be included in the objective function in the examination timetabling problem.
Version:
IFS 1.4 (Instructor Sectioning)
